pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![PyPi Release](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/maestral-cocoa.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/maestral-cocoa/)[![Pyversions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/maestral-cocoa.svg)](https://pypi.org/pypi/maestral-cocoa/)# Maestral Cocoa A Cocoa user interface for the [Maestral Daemon](https://www.github.com/samschott/maestral-dropbox).
